subject: Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Sports Injuries
Officiating (Sports)
Cheating
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Research has determined that women were much less likely than men to fake injuries on the soccer field. Still, the practice played a key role in United States’ quarterfinal victory over Brazil.
snippet: Research has determined that women were much less likely than men to fake injuries on the soccer field. Still, the practice played a key role in United States’ quarterfinal victory over Brazil.
